creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Man in a wide rimmed hat and long pants; he drags a heavy object behind him as he walks; the words "March 1988/He tried to carry something too large./He felt like he was falling" inscribed, UC; yellow and dark cream background
medium: Lithographs with hand-coloring on hand-made paper in linen portfolio box
title: Study for "March 1988 - He Tried to Carry Something Too Large, He Felt Like He Was Falling" from the Portfolio "Lilacs and Smoke"
